## Interactive Calculators

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-5">
  <div class="col-md-6 mb-4">
    <div class="card h-100">
      <div class="card-header">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">CIDR Subnet Calculator</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>Calculate IP address ranges, subnet masks, and network information from CIDR notation.</p>
        <div class="mt-3">
          <form class="mb-3">
            <div class="input-group">
              <input type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="Enter CIDR (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24)" aria-label="CIDR notation">
              <button class="btn btn-primary" type="button">Calculate</button>
            </div>
          </form>
          <div class="alert alert-secondary">
            <p><strong>Sample Result:</strong></p>
            <ul class="mb-0">
              <li>Network Address: 192.168.1.0</li>
              <li>Broadcast Address: 192.168.1.255</li>
              <li>Subnet Mask: 255.255.255.0</li>
              <li>Total Hosts: 254</li>
            </ul>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="card-footer">
        <a href="cidr-calculator.html" class="btn btn-outline-primary">Full Calculator</a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="col-md-6 mb-4">
    <div class="card h-100">
      <div class="card-header">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Data Breach Cost Estimator</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>Estimate the potential financial impact of a data breach based on industry, size, and data types.</p>
        <div class="mt-3">
          <form class="mb-3">
            <div class="mb-2">
              <select class="form-select" aria-label="Industry selection">
                <option selected>Select Industry</option>
                <option value="healthcare">Healthcare</option>
                <option value="financial">Financial Services</option>
                <option value="technology">Technology</option>
                <option value="retail">Retail</option>
                <option value="manufacturing">Manufacturing</option>
              </select>
            </div>
            <div class="input-group">
              <input type="number" class="form-control" placeholder="Number of Records" aria-label="Number of records">
              <button class="btn btn-primary" type="button">Estimate</button>
            </div>
          </form>
          <div class="alert alert-secondary">
            <p><strong>Sample Result:</strong></p>
            <p class="mb-0">Estimated cost range: $2.1M - $4.3M</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="card-footer">
        <a href="breach-cost-estimator.html" class="btn btn-outline-primary">Full Estimator</a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```

## Download Our Command-Line Tools

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-5">
  <div class="col-md-6 mb-4">
    <div class="card h-100">
      <div class="card-header">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">CloudScan CLI</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>A command-line tool for scanning cloud environments for security misconfigurations and compliance issues.</p>
        <div class="mt-3">
          <p><strong>Features:</strong></p>
          <ul>
            <li>Multi-cloud support (AWS, Azure, GCP)</li>
            <li>Compliance frameworks (CIS, NIST, PCI DSS)</li>
            <li>JSON/CSV/HTML reports</li>
            <li>Customizable rule sets</li>
          </ul>
          <div class="mt-3">
            <pre><code>$ cloudscan audit --provider aws --region us-east-1 --framework cis</code></pre>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="card-footer">
        <div class="d-flex gap-2">
          <a href="https://github.com/chenist/cloudscan" class="btn btn-outline-dark" target="_blank">
            <i class="bi bi-github"></i> GitHub
          </a>
          <a href="downloads/cloudscan-cli-v1.2.0.zip" class="btn btn-primary" download>
            <i class="bi bi-download"></i> Download (v1.2.0)
          </a>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="col-md-6 mb-4">
    <div class="card h-100">
      <div class="card-header">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">SecretScan</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>A command-line tool for detecting and preventing secrets and sensitive information in code repositories.</p>
        <div class="mt-3">
          <p><strong>Features:</strong></p>
          <ul>
            <li>Pre-commit hook integration</li>
            <li>CI/CD pipeline support</li>
            <li>Custom pattern detection</li>
            <li>False positive management</li>
          </ul>
          <div class="mt-3">
            <pre><code>$ secretscan check --path ./src --exclude node_modules</code></pre>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="card-footer">
        <div class="d-flex gap-2">
          <a href="https://github.com/chenist/secretscan" class="btn btn-outline-dark" target="_blank">
            <i class="bi bi-github"></i> GitHub
          </a>
          <a href="downloads/secretscan-v0.9.5.zip" class="btn btn-primary" download>
            <i class="bi bi-download"></i> Download (v0.9.5)
          </a>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
```
